metadata.title: CVE-2022-0487 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in rtsx_usb_ms_drv_remove indrivers/memstick/host/rtsx_usb_ms.c in memstick in the Linux kernel. Inthis flaw, a local attacker with a user privilege may impact systemConfidentiality. This flaw affects kernel versions prior to 5.14 rc1.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
